mapper.insert: insert into movie_actor (movie_id, actor_id, cast_order, cast_eng_name) values (#{movieId}, #{actorId}, #{castOrder}, #{castEngName})
mapper.select: SELECT actor.id actor_id, actor.tmdb_id, actor.kor_name, actor.eng_name, movie_actor.cast_eng_name, actor.img_url, actor.popularity FROM movie_actor INNER JOIN actor ON movie_actor.actor_id = actor.id WHERE movie_actor.movie_id = #{movieId} ORDER BY movie_actor.cast_order
